title: Let the Plat can queue with silver in ranked flex PLEASE!!!!!
body: It is so annoying most of people are between silver and plat, and they cannot queue with each other

replies.body:
if you look at it actually, most people are Bronze and Silver (over 80%).

Riot made the change to stop people queing more than 1 tier ahead of where they are to stop boosters.

Plat V and higher is actually the top 7% of players in OCE.
Even to hit gold you are in the top 19% of the server.

So no, silvers should not be allowed to go anywhere near a Plat game.

http://oce.op.gg/statistics/tier/
Are you sure you just want it so your friend can boost you?

doing what you are saying is really just defeating the purpose of ranked.  Ranked MMR is to showcase your skill. hence why Plats arent seen in a Silver elo. Just because your friends are higher than you doesnt mean you can't play normals. Normal MMR is based on your wins, so you see players from all divisions ideally

Sucks when you havequeued with your partner for years and years and then you get a double promo and they do not.

No more duo bae, I cant play with lowly silvers
